title: Cafe 212
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lunch and coffee shop located in downtown Tupelo, next to the Main Attraction. Offers vegan options of a garden salad and Pleasantville veggie grill. Offers a coffee shop menu from 7:30-11am. Serves lunch from 11am-2pm. From 2pm to close serves snacks, desserts and drinks in the cafe area. Eclectic fun atmosphere and features artwork from local artists. Seating inside for 50 and an outdoor patio and lounge area with used books for sale. Wi-fi. Hosts private parties on request and offers catering services for business meetings and other events.
